text: At #covid19 & financing for development event w/ @antonioguterres, @JustinTrudeau, @AndrewHolnessJM, I proposed a global recovery initiative that links investment & debt relief to the SDGs. A recovery that's green, digital & resilient. It's up to us to build back better together. https://t.co/t0MiNu2om3
